Title: The Coffin in the Mountain
Writer: Yuanliang Feng, Nifan Lu, Yukun Xin
Actors: Weimin Huo, Xiaotian Wang, Yun Luo, Yuzen Yang
Plot: A young man tries to get away from his family's overwhelming power, but when he accidentally kills a local thug, his fate will be intricately linked to his father's. A woman, who for years ...
